column2: Large scale server deploys using BitTorrent and the BitTornado library (NOTE: project no longer maintained)

column5:
Merge pull request #12 from rthomas/master

Custom tmp locations

Merge pull request #16 from rcohen/master

Fix for "TypeError: slice indices must be integers or None"
Fix for TypeError during endgame mode.
Added support for custom tmp locations by either overriding the default_temp_location or specifying the temp_location as an environment variable
Make sure screen runs without any custom screenrc settings (I found that my screenrc breaks murder)
fix scenario where the machine sending the dist package is one of the recipients. thanks to robinbowes for reporting this bug.
Ensure "host" produces output in English so the awk command can grep the output consistently. Also fixes getting only one ip address
Re-write some code using &:foo syntax which doesn't work in ruby 1.8.6
do not display the time when finished transferring
fix relative path to dist files
fix presentation of commands in steps
some defaults: empty default tag, seeder_files_path, destination_path. peers default to all hosts except no_release => true. seeder/tracker default to first peer
pad start_tracker command with sleep to allow it to finish starting up before cap disconnects
do not define hosts but rely on roles. define empty default vars
move example murder_config to example Capfile
find dist path relative to murder_admin.rb
move Capfile and murder_config to examples dir
move ruby files into lib folder
